titles.title: 403 The Sands Of Time Are Sinking

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
The sands of time
Are sinking
The dawn
Of heaven breaks
The summer morn
I've sighed for
The fair sweet
Morn awakes

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Dark dark
Hath been the midnight
But dayspring is at hand
And glory glory dwelleth
In Immanuel's land.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
O Christ!
He is the fountain
The deep sweet well of love
The streams
On earth I've tasted
More deep I'll drink above

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
There to an ocean's fullness
His mercies doth expand
And glory glory dwelleth
In Immanuel's land

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
With mercy
And with judgment
My web of time He wove
And aye the dews
Of sorrow
Were lustered
With His love

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
I'll bless the hand
That guided
I'll bless the heart
That planned
When throned
Where glory dwelleth
In Immanuel's land

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Oh I am my Beloved's
And my Beloved's mine
He brings a poor vile sinner
Into his house of wine.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
I stand upon His merit
I know no other stand
Not e'en
Where glory dwelleth
In Immanuel's land

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
The Bride eyes not her garment
But her
dear Bridegroom's face
I will not gaze at glory
But on my King of grace

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Not at the crown He giveth
But on His pierced hand
The Lamb is all the glory
Of Immanuel's land
